actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency School Aid Act to extend to French-Americans the same benefits accorded other minority groups under that act.

summary.text: Extends to French-Americans the same benefits afforded other minority groups under the Emergency School Aid Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency School Aid Act to extend to French-Americans the same benefits accorded other minority groups under that act.
